name: Super Ordinary Joe
description:
For Joe, the path to success is right ahead, but is he dedicated enough to attain it? Grind your way to a healthy athletic body in this upgrade / platformer game and get… the… CAKE!!

****

GAMEPAD CONTROLS
A : Jump / Select
B : Punch / Cancel
Left / Right : Run

KEYBOARD CONTROLS
Left / Right or S / F : Run
Z / C /  J / E / Up : Jump
X / V / K : Punch

VOLUME CONTROL
-(1) . SFX . (2)+
-(3) MUSIC (4)+

A game by Small is Beautiful Studio
www.smallinteractive.com
